theme: जीव ब्रह्म में बहुत भेद है
meaning: भेदव्यपदेशात् = भेदः + व्यपदेशात्भेदः (bhedaḥ) = difference, distinction, diversityव्यपदेशात् (vyapadeśāt) = from the declaration, indication, specificationMeaning: From the declaration or specification of differences.Explanation: This phrase refers to the idea that the understanding of Brahman, the ultimate reality, comes from the teachings or declarations that describe the distinctions or differences between various aspects or manifestations of Brahman. It suggests that through these teachings, one can gain knowledge of the different forms and qualities of Brahman, ultimately leading to a deeper comprehension of its true nature.
